name: Shapescape
description:
A game jam game made in 4 days!

Programmer - Miko Sramek
Animator - Joy Sun
UI & Artist - Andrew Guan
Technical Artist - Rubi Carpio

Check out our team's twitter at Atomic Space Frogs!

Work together by jumping and fitting the correct slot into the gate! Keep the door lowered until everyone has made it through! Or abandon your friends and keep yourself alive!
